description: two running men in LRC, wearing blue coats, dark caps, and brown and blue patterned pants, holding branches, accompanied by two brown dogs, chasing a deer; squirrel running up a tree at right edge; blue, brown, black and white; additional man and dog in middle ground in URQ

title: The Hunt
